verses.name: Acts 28:26
verses.text: Saying, Go unto this people, and say, Hearing ye shall hear, and shall not understand; and seeing ye shall see, and not perceive:

verses.name: Acts 28:27
verses.text: For the heart of this people is waxed gross, and their ears are dull of hearing, and their eyes have they closed; lest they should see with their eyes, and hear with their ears, and understand with their heart, and should be converted, and I should heal them.

verses.name: Acts 28:28
verses.text: Be it known therefore unto you, that the salvation of God is sent unto the Gentiles, and that they will hear it.
